other_tests.findings: Mild dilatation of the left hepatic and right anterior biliary tree is stable, common bile duct measures up to 1.0 cm, unchanged from previous exam, pancreas has some loss of signal intensity with persistent enhancement, very mildly increased T2 signal, no focal mass or main pancreatic duct dilatation, kidneys show multiple rounded T2 hyperintense lesions consistent with simple cysts, large duodenum diverticulum is unchanged.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stable findings in biliary tree dilatation and common bile duct size; duodenum diverticulum unchanged.
